meanings.definition: Not expressing genuine feelings or intentions.
meanings.sent1: Her insincere smile didn't reach her eyes.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his insincere compliments.
meanings.sent3: The insincere apology only made things worse.
meanings.sent4: The insincere promises faded like morning mist.
meanings.sent5: The insincere tone of his voice was unmistakable.

meanings.sent1: She gave him an insincere hug to hide her true feelings.
meanings.sent2: Their insincere laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: His insincere act fooled no one.
meanings.sent4: The insincere facade crumbled under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The insincere mask slipped, revealing his true nature.
